Two more in Boston die from flu, including child

Five of the city's six deaths this flu season have been in adults over age 65, and one was a child under six years old, a Boston health official said. (Boston Globe)

The latest prank by MIT hackers came to an end this afternoon when crews removed the video game character from its perch. (Boston Globe)

More Your Campus sites

Boy critical after being shot in Roxbury

The 13-year-old was rushed into surgery Friday night at Boston Medical Center after he was shot while walking to church on Humboldt Avenue, police said. (Globe)

Wreckage found from lost fishing boat

The Coast Guard said the Gloucester-based fishing vessel, which disappeared last month, was found Friday submerged between Provincetown and Cape Ann. (AP)
  • 12/17 Coast Guard searches for missing boat, 2 men

Mass. school teachers to be fingerprinted

A new state law requires teachers at public and private schools, workers at child care centers, and school bus drivers to get criminal background checks. (AP)
